message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product for a great price of $20,000. I know it's valuable to you and I'm looking forward to hearing your thoughts.

Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product and appreciate your generosity, however, I am only able to pay up to $15,000 for it. Would you consider meeting me halfway?
Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I see you're serious about this product.  How about we meet at $18,000? It's a very competitive price for something of this value.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we possibly agree on a price closer to $15,000?
